long_description: Asymmetric panels, a cozy 3-piece draped hood and a V-neck opening push the hiking-worthy Merrell Skye hoodie way past basic. Polyester/cotton blend feels soft, wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly, making it easy to wear again just hours after washing. The Merrell Skye hoodie features a relaxed, draped fit. Closeout.
short_description: Asymmetric panels, a cozy 3-piece draped hood and a V-neck opening push the hiking-worthy Merrell Skye hoodie way past basic.
